subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Upton scored the winning run on Miguel Montero’s 10th-inning sacrifice fly and the Diamondbacks, who hardly touched Johan Santana, defeated the Mets at Shea Stadium.
snippet: Justin Upton scored the winning run on Miguel Montero’s 10th-inning sacrifice fly and the Diamondbacks, who hardly touched Johan Santana, defeated the Mets at Shea Stadium.
